segments.text: I see the boy reaching for the cookie jar, and it’s making me so nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is about to tip over, and he’s not even trying to balance properly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the mess behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she’s just standing there like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to regret not paying attention when someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty, and they’re going to be in so much trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn’t tip over before the woman turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, but inside, it’s a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
